content:
In March we had the opportunity to do our second workshop in Europe. The two-day workshop in London was a fantastic success, having sold out multiple times over. Since then we've refined our training materials and we're bringing more workshops to Europe.

Tiberiu Covaci, the first participant in our Aurelia Certified Trainer program, will be delivering two workshops in coming months.

### Workshops

**May 25, 2016 in Stockholm** - A One-Day Aurelia Workshop associated with the DevSum Conference. You can learn more and sign up [here](http://www.devsum.se/the-aurelia-workshop-tiberiu-covaci/). Act fast..the event is right around the corner.

**July 11 & 12, 2016 in London** - A Two-Day Aurelia Workshop at Learning Connexions. You can read more and sign up [here](http://www.learningconnexions.com/courses/developing-modern-applications-with-aurelia/391).

#### About Tibi

Tibi is an independent consultant specializing in .NET, web development, and Microsoft Azure, with 20 years of industry experience. He is the lead author of MCSD Certification Toolkit (Exam 70-483): Programming in C# and a former member of the Microsoft Learning Board of Advisors. Tibi has a broad set of skills in the web sphere from client-side JavaScript, HTML5, Angular.js, Aurelia.js, Knockout.js to intimate server-side knowledge of ASP.NET, as well as Microsoft Azure.

### Even More Workshops

Are you interested in having an Aurelia workshop in your city? Please [get in touch](email:training@durandal.io) and help us plan the event. If your company is willing to provide facilities for the event and help us get the word out, we would be happy to offer discounts to employees who attend.

Stay tuned for more information on training opportunities.
